definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)

sentences.english: In this paper studed the algorithm to realize the disjoint calculation in multistate system.
sentences.chinese: 該文研究多狀態系統不交化運算的實現算法。

sentences.english: Shifts the bits of an expression to the right, maintaining sign.
sentences.chinese: 將運算式的位元向右移，保留正負號。

sentences.english: Loosely, a mathematical or logic operator.
sentences.chinese: 不嚴格地說，一種數學或邏輯運算符。

sentences.english: All assignment operators return the value that is assigned to the left operand.
sentences.chinese: 所有的賦值運算符都返回賦給左操作數的值。

sentences.english: A kind of Boolean operational method based on a three-dimensional grid model was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於三維網格模型的布爾運算方法。

sentences.english: It has changed from an optimization philosophy for 32-bit operands.
sentences.chinese: 它從優化哲學變成了32位運算。

sentences.english: So each time through the loop, I'm doing three steps. Three basic operations.
sentences.chinese: 因此每次運行這個循環，我做了三次基本運算。

sentences.english: Fast and accurate computation of the arcsine function in a modern engineering has been used widely.
sentences.chinese: 快速精確的反正弦函數運算在現代工程中應用廣泛。

sentences.english: The operator must have anl-value as its left operand.
sentences.chinese: 該運算符必須將左值作爲其左操作數。

sentences.english: Specially, it fits reasoning for the large-scale FPN model.
sentences.chinese: 尤其適合較大規模的FPN模型的推理運算。

sentences.english: And now I have to do the mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 現在我需要做一個數學運算。

sentences.english: Finally, the computation accuracy of IDCT is verified.
sentences.chinese: 最後對IDCT單元的運算精度進行了驗證。

sentences.english: IDENTITY is also called Exclusive-NOR. The article also discusses operation laws and priorities in Boolean algebra.
sentences.chinese: 文中還討論了布爾代數的運算規律和運算次序。

sentences.english: IDENTITY is also called Exclusive-NOR. The article also discusses operation laws and priorities in Boolean algebra.
sentences.chinese: 文中還討論了布爾代數的運算規律和運算次序。

sentences.english: Logarithms were invented to shorten the work of extended numerical computation .
sentences.chinese: 人們發明對數來縮短運算冗長的數值計算工作。

sentences.english: Then by adapting the one-element-operator, the number of information bit increases further to maximum.
sentences.chinese: 然後進一步採用一元運算將信息位數增到最大。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3
